sentences.english: We frequently went places, visiting parks and coffee shops.
sentences.chinese: 我們經常去別處，逛公園和咖啡店。

sentences.english: On any free time, she would have the obnoxiously busy job at the coffee shop across the street from campus.
sentences.chinese: 空餘的時間會在學校對街熱鬧的咖啡店打工。

sentences.english: or the coffee shops, things of that nature.
sentences.chinese: 或者在咖啡店，那一類型的地方。

sentences.english: She likes to stay in the coffee house which is an all-nighter.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡待在通宵經營的咖啡店裏。

sentences.english: The prices in a caf are not any cheaper than a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡店的東西價錢一點都不比餐館便宜。

sentences.english: I am in a cafe in a town in north Wales.
sentences.chinese: 我正在北威爾士一個小鎮的咖啡店裏。

sentences.english: I went to the café and bought a cup of latté.
sentences.chinese: 我走進了咖啡店，點了一杯拿鐵。

sentences.english: We stopped and had some light refreshments at a cafe.
sentences.chinese: 我們停下來在一家咖啡店用了一些清淡的點心。

sentences.english: He's running a cafe at a wide place in the road.
sentences.chinese: 他在公路邊的一個小鎮上開了家咖啡店。

sentences.english: Most had opened too near to an existing Starbucks store, and business analysts think the markets were oversaturated .
sentences.chinese: 很多咖啡店開的太近，商業分析師認爲市場已經飽和。

sentences.english: Places like coffee shops, spiritual centers or classes.
sentences.chinese: 像咖啡店，靈性中心或者班級這些地方。

sentences.english: Because believe you me , all the rest of it is just coffeehousebullshit.
sentences.chinese: 因爲除此之外，其他的都是在咖啡店鬼扯的狗屁。

sentences.english: Which coffee shop employs Ben and Felicity?
sentences.chinese: 本和費莉希蒂在哪家咖啡店工作？
阿姆斯特丹的無煙咖啡店？

sentences.english: After an hour he was in a coffee shop to meet the army green.
sentences.chinese: 一小時後他在咖啡店見到了陸亞青。

sentences.english: Renovation of Kopitiam, Food Court, Restaurant, Pub, School and other project works.
sentences.chinese: 裝修咖啡店，食閣，餐館，酒廊和其他項目工作。
